column5: GULFVIEW II IS A SIX STORY COMPLEX WITH A RELATIVELY EASY WALK TO THE BEACH. IT IS LOCATED ON THE SOUTH END OF THE ISLAND NEXT TO SCHLITTERBAHN WATERPARK. ENJOY A DAY STROLLING DOWN OUR SANDY BEACHES OR DOWN BY THE LARGE POOL AREA WITH TWO HOT TUBS.
column8: Condo w/ massive pool, hot tubs, bbq areas
